lines: Sorry, you're still too young for this experience.  Come back later.
Sorry, you're too old for this experience.

Mike Lewis is a guy you have had a crush on for a very long time. A friend of his tells you that Mike told him that all he wants is to go out with you and "be" with you. There is only one problem -- Mike has a girlfriend, and you are
You arrange, through the friend, to meet Mike in secret at a fast food restaurant. How romantic!

You hear, through the friend, that Mike agrees to meet you there at 2 o'clock this Saturday. You have already made plans for Saturday afternoon with the guy you are seeing, and you will have to lie in order to break them.
You succeed in breaking your date for Saturday.
You get to the restaurant a bit early and get a large order of French fries.
It's 2:15 and the fries are gone. If you spend any more money, you will have almost none left.
At 2:30 you order a small cola.
At 2:45 you think you see someone who looks like him come through the large glass door. You heart begins to race....
The person who actually walks through the door is old enough to be your father. All of this waiting is causing you to see things.
At 3 o'clock the person who sweeps up and cleans the tables asks if you still want the cup from your cola, which you have mangled and broken up into little pieces. You say, "Yes."
At 3:15 you think about whether or not you should try to call Mike at home.
You call...the line is busy. Maybe he is trying to reach you at your house.
You call your house. There is no answer. It is 3:45.
It's 11 p.m.. I can't believe you waited for him for almost nine hours!
